MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DD6 postcode area of Newport-on-Tay. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:40pm due to a fault on an undergrounds mains cable on Kirk Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50PM on Thursday 22 April 2021
